import React , {Component} from 'react' import Video from './Video' export default class Skins extends Component { constructor(){ super() this.state = { skinIndex: 0 } } handleClick = (num,max) => { let skinIndex = this.state.skinIndex + num > max ? 0 : this.state.skinIndex + num < 0 ? max : this.state.skinIndex + num this.setState({skinIndex}) } render(){ let skins = this.props.skins return(

{skins[this.state.skinIndex].name}

this.handleClick(-1,skins.length - 1)}> this.handleClick(1, skins.length - 1)}>
) } }
